code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InterviewScheduler=_ref=>{let{socket,sendMessage,isConnected}=_ref;const[selectedCandidate,setSelectedCandidate]=useState('');const[interviewDate,setInterviewDate]=useState('');const[interviewTime,setInterviewTime]=useState('');const scheduleInterview=()=>{if(!selectedCandidate||!interviewDate||!interviewTime){alert('Please fill all fields');return;}alert("Interview scheduled for ".concat(selectedCandidate," on ").concat(interviewDate," at ").concat(interviewTime));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{marginBottom:'12px'},children:"Interview Scheduler"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Schedule and manage candidate interviews"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Candidate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:selectedCandidate,onChange:e=>setSelectedCandidate(e.target.value),className:"form-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Candidate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"John Doe",children:"John Doe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Jane Smith",children:"Jane Smith"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Mike Johnson",children:"Mike Johnson"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:interviewDate,onChange:e=>setInterviewDate(e.target.value),className:"form-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",value:interviewTime,onChange:e=>setInterviewTime(e.target.value),className:"form-input"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:scheduleInterview,children:"Schedule Interview"})]});};export default InterviewScheduler;
